name: HBAgency
author: ICardoo Digital Marketing S.R.L.

sections.description:
The official HBAgency (https://www.hbagency.it) plugin makes the integration process effortless.

With this plugin, you can:
– Easily integrate your WordPress website with our advanced technology.
– Automatically insert and update ads.txt, scripts, and ad placements.
– Manage placements and edit additional lines in your ads.txt file with ease.

Thank you for choosing our platform.

By using this plugin you agree to our Terms and Conditions (https://www.hbagency.it/terms https://www.hbagency.ai/terms)
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 – 22/10/2024

Updated HBAgency Logo URL

1.0.1 – 17/10/2024

Addressed a layout page issue that occurred under certain conditions

1.0.0 – 12/06/2024

First release of the HBAgency Plugin
Placements, ads.txt and CMP management.

short_description: Effortlessly integrate HBAgency on your website with our official plugin. Insert ads.txt, manage placements, and integrate our script seamlessly.
